sentence: Fringe candidate Doug Mastriano has been enthusiastically endorsed by former President Donald Trump and appears likely to prevail in the primary on Tuesday.

title: Republicans are already accepting defeat in Pa. governor's race -- and are looking for someone to blame

sentence: She's also running on an unofficial ticket with Republican gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastriano, a state senator and vocal leader in efforts to overturn Trump's election loss in the state.

title: LIVE RESULTS: John Fetterman wins the Democratic primary for Pennsylvania's Senate race
